div.h2: SNOMED CT Drug Therapy Status codes

div.p: This value set includes some taken and not taken reason codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar

This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 266710000 (Drugs not taken/completed)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 410684002 (Drug therapy status)

title.value: SNOMED CT Drug Therapy Status codes
